Class VideoGrabber

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.model.VideoGrabber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class VideoGrabber
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Thread class used to cut a video in some pictures.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VideoGrabber

        public VideoGrabber(java.lang.String videoPath,
                    MainViewController ctrl,
                    javafx.scene.image.ImageView view,
                    int framesPerSecond)
        This constructor assigns the basic attributes of the grabber.
        Parameters:
        videoPath - the path of the video going to be cut
        ctrl - a ref to the ctrl to update views
        view - the view who need the update with the new picture
        framesPerSecond - the desired frame per second for the video

    • Method Detail

        This thread cut a video in multiple picture and update the view with the new image.

        Simple setter of thread running status.

      • isNeedSave

        public boolean isNeedSave()
        Simple getter to know if the pictures will be saved.
        Returns:
        true if the pictures will be save, false otherwise

      • setNeedSave

        public void setNeedSave(boolean needSave)
        Simple setter to change the save status.
        Parameters:
